page.title: 15WALLYFORD VILLAGE
page.content: ABOUT HALF OF WALLYFORD VILLAGE IS CONTAINED IN OUR AREA.THE POPULATION OF THE WHOLE VILLAGE IS 2518.OUR SECTION OF THE VILLAGE CONTAINS A COUNCIL HOUSING SCHEME AND AN INDUSTRIAL ESTATE.ON THE ESTATE THERE IS A FIRM MAKING GEARS, A COMPANY PRODUCING AIR CONDITIONING SYSTEMS AND A FARMERS SUPPLY ASSOCIATION.THERE IS ALSO A SCULPTOR. THE SITE WAS DEVELOPED BY LOTHIAN REGIONAL COUNCIL AND THE SCOTTISH DEVELOPMENT AGENCY .FIRMS ARE OFFERED SITES OF UP TO ONE ACRE AND SMALL ADVANCE FACTORIES.OUR SECTION OF WALLYFORD CONTAINS A SEWAGE PLANT.THERE ARE TWO SHOPS,A PUBLIC HOUSE,A BETTING OFFICE AND A POST OFFICE.THE REMAINDER OF THE SECTION IS FARM LAND.ONE OF THE FARMS CONTAINS A FIELD WHERE THE BATTLE OF BARBACHLAW WAS FOUGHT IN 1547.
